response.body:
# HELP rag_queries_total Total number of RAG queries
# TYPE rag_queries_total counter
rag_queries_total{tenant_id="test_tenant",confidence="high"} 150
rag_queries_total{tenant_id="test_tenant",confidence="medium"} 85
rag_queries_total{tenant_id="test_tenant",confidence="low"} 23

# HELP rag_query_duration_seconds RAG query duration in seconds
# TYPE rag_query_duration_seconds histogram
rag_query_duration_seconds_bucket{le="1.0"} 45
rag_query_duration_seconds_bucket{le="5.0"} 180
rag_query_duration_seconds_bucket{le="10.0"} 240
rag_query_duration_seconds_bucket{le="+Inf"} 258
rag_query_duration_seconds_sum 1842.5
rag_query_duration_seconds_count 258

# HELP rag_confidence_score RAG confidence score distribution
# TYPE rag_confidence_score histogram
rag_confidence_score_bucket{le="0.3"} 23
rag_confidence_score_bucket{le="0.6"} 108
rag_confidence_score_bucket{le="0.8"} 208
rag_confidence_score_bucket{le="1.0"} 258
rag_confidence_score_sum 187.4
rag_confidence_score_count 258
